title: Lore Master Quiz, The First Edition - League of Legends, Lore Spotlight

embed.description: Welcome to the first lore master quiz. How well will you do? Don't forget to leave the answer to the final question in the comments, and if possible the reasoning behind it! See you next friday for the next lore master quiz!

body:
How much do you know about League Lore? Try to answer as many questions as you can correctly!

P.S. Took me quite a bit to make this, so I hope it turned out well and you have fun! 
See you in the next one!

replies.body:
Ooh well this was fun!

WARNING - Slightly obfuscated **spoilers** below!  I'll try not to make them obvious, but you have been warned!

I got almost all of them (as you'd hope) but there were a couple that I got a different answer for, or just disagree with.  Also, I confess that my skin-lore is remedial at best.  (If it's not core Runeterra, then I'm less into it!)

Speaking of which, I _loved_ the geography questions, but the one for Stage 3 I _strongly_ object to the answer!  Definitely not what I'd go with.  I'd have been impressed, and I would have conceeded my failure gracefully, if the answer had been the Arbormark.

I got S2.Q3 wrong, and that's just me being rubbish.  No excuses - I really should have got that!
S3.Q1 I didn't know the answer and guessed, wrong, and I feel a little less bad about not knowing, but still.  Could have done better.
S3.Q2 I guessed, correctly.  Skin lore!!! My nemesis!
S3.Q3 I guessed, correctly, again!  Not sure I have an excuse not for being more informed on that one though :(
S3.Q4 I got right, confidently, but I'm actually not sure if that piece of lore is still true, since a recent update?
S3.Q5 Correct again, but I winced at the skin-lore-ness of it.  I guess I remembered slightly more than I thought I did.
S3.Q7 I got this.  Not sure if it's 'real lore' or not, but I got it!  Love those things.
S3.Q8 THIS QUESTION.  I disagree that it's home.  See above.

As for my answer to the final question, I'd say that there is never one, without the other.  (This isn't an official Rito answer - just my own take!)

> S3.Q4 I got right, confidently, but I'm actually not sure if that piece of lore is still true, since a recent update?
> S3.Q5 Correct again, but I winced at the skin-lore-ness of it.  I guess I remembered slightly more than I thought I did.
> S3.Q7 I got this.  Not sure if it's 'real lore' or not, but I got it!  Love those things.
> S3.Q8 THIS QUESTION.  I disagree that it's home.  See above.
> 
> As for my answer to the final question, I'd say that there is never one, without the other.  (This isn't an official Rito answer - just my own take!)

I totally get what you're saying about the question you disagree with. It certainly should've been worded differently, and that was the challenge with some of the questions. It's pretty much a technicality, as I composed a ton of questions, after a while, the specific technical wording faded a bit. Looking back at it now, it would make more sense to word the question with something along the lines of "regions accessible on Valoran" or "can be found on Valoran" but quite honestly, it went over my head and I just defaulted to "The home of" - just because it sounded nice haha. I'll definitely try to be more careful about it in the next quiz :)

Also, your final answer made me smile because that (although not official, but according to my research) should be the correct answer I'd say!
Very nice quiz and well done animation-wise, although I wish there were some Shurima-related questions too.

> [{quoted}](name=RyzeTheSmurfMage,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EydKE53o,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-05-12T07:09:37.633+0000)

There certainly will be in the next one :)
This is a great idea, especially for those who like their lore-knowledge tested :)

Bandle City is actually in a different dimension separate and connected to both Shurima and Valoran, isn't it?
It's the only one I got wrong so im trying to _technically_ my way out of it... T-T

For the last question, does Bard count?  He's existed since before this universe iirc.
Which makes him older than both ASol and the conception of mortal beings within meaning he also predates Kindred.
So I did the whole quiz now and I got 5 questions wrong, tbh not that bad since there are over 25 questions, so I got like 4/5 right
Sion was first in the game, Singed was first designed. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
nah bro, sion was first champ in game.

https://imgur.com/cdDK9Tv.png[]

Annie's index is 1.

Sions is 14 FYI.

They were also all part of the 1st 6 champ designs along with Lee, Sivir and Twisted Fate.

Where'd you hear he was the first programmed?

...

Dude.  Open op the chamo thing and click annies icon.  The icons use their index, which is why new champs number into the hundreds due the champs who were never released.

Shes coded as 1.

It does change locations, I didn't word the question too well. I thought "...locations that could be found on Valoran" but I read "Home to..." Probably not the best word choice. I'll be sure to be more careful in the future :)

Bandle city isn't on Valoran

It isnt even on Runterra 

Also the answer to the final question is easily Aurelion Sol
